definition: to select/to choose/to pick over/to pick out/to differentiate/to eliminate/also pr. [zhai2]
topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]

sentences.english: So let's go to a clicker question.
sentences.chinese: 那麼讓我們來做一個選擇題。

sentences.english: The Senior Technician exam is composed of 100 multiple-choice questions.
sentences.chinese: 高級技師考試由100道選擇題組成。

sentences.english: So, let's turn to another clicker question here.
sentences.chinese: 那麼，讓我們進入下一個選擇題的環節。

sentences.english: The total scores from the free-response section and the multiple-choice section are combined to form a composite score.
sentences.chinese: 自由答題和選擇題的總分將會加在一起形成複合分。

sentences.english: At present only single-choice questions are available here on line.
sentences.chinese: 目前上線的題目形式是單項選擇題。

sentences.english: LZ are you testing the CET Band -4?It will be great if you add some selecting questions.
sentences.chinese: 樓主你在考大家四級嗎？下面加幾個選擇題就圓滿了。

sentences.english: OK, great. Good job on the clicker questions today.
sentences.chinese: 好的，非常好，今天的選擇題都做得太好了。

sentences.english: You must answer multiple choice questions to deactivate the alarm.
sentences.chinese: 你必須回答多項選擇題才能關停鬧鈴。

sentences.english: Mother Teresa? In most cases, the format was multiple choice.
sentences.chinese: 大多數題目是選擇題的形式。

sentences.english: The exam is open book and consists of multiple choice questions.
sentences.chinese: 考試是開卷考試，由若干選擇題組成。

sentences.english: So, let's do a clicker question on isoelectronic atoms.
sentences.chinese: 那麼，讓我們來做一個關於等電子原子的選擇題吧。

sentences.english: Test for Candidates' material handling capacity and thinking level of assessment is usually on the back of some non-multiple-choice questions.
sentences.chinese: 往往是選擇題部分考覈對基礎知識的再現再認能力。

sentences.english: My teacher gave us the hardest multiple choice questions.
sentences.chinese: 我的老師給我們一次最難的選擇題測驗。

sentences.english: Multiple choice questions are common in physics exercise.
sentences.chinese: 選擇題是物理習題中的常見題型。

sentences.english: So the choice question of life, how much points can you gets?
sentences.chinese: 人生的選擇題，你能得幾分呢？

sentences.english: No early leaves are permitted in examinations where multiple-choice questions are set.
sentences.chinese: 學生不得於任何選擇題形式的考試中提早離開試場。

definition: question bank (for examiners creating an exam, or students preparing for an exam)
to contend on strong grounds/to argue strongly for what is right
literature and language/(PRC) Chinese (as a school subject)
to avoid the important and dwell on the trivial/to keep silent about major charges while admitting minor ones
different routes to the same destination (idiom); fig. different means of achieve the same end
